greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array read by antidiagonals: T(n,k) = (k+1)^n*(n+k)!.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3000
maple: T := proc(n,k) return (k+1)^n*(n+k)!: end: seq(seq(T(n-k,k), k=0..n), n=0..10); # _Nathaniel Johnston_, May 01 2011
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 05 2009
